title: nRide
shortDescription: A Peer-to-Peer Ride Hailing Protocol
longDescription: nRide, the innovative peer-to-peer ride-hailing platform, is revolutionizing the industry by directly connecting riders and drivers. Designed to prioritize transparency and reduce fees, this community-owned protocol challenges traditional ride-hailing services with its user-focused approach. Powered by CosmWasm smart contracts on JUNO and governed by a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO), nRide offers a more equitable, secure, and efficient way of ride-hailing in the Web 3.0 era.

title: Cosmostation
shortDescription: Non-custodial multi-chain extension wallet powered by Cosmostation, the interchain validator. Cosmostation is a non-custodial multi-chain cryptocurrency browser extension wallet that supports 50+ chains including Ethereum, Cosmos, dYdX Chain, Sui, and more. With Cosmostation, you can manage all your assets with one wallet, one key. Cosmostation has been a web3 infrastructure team contributing to more than 50 protocols since 2018. Our suite of products include Mintscan block explorer, Cosmostation non-custodial crypto wallet, and node validator service. At Cosmostation, we bootstrap networks and onboard end-users.
longDescription: Non-custodial multi-chain extension wallet powered by Cosmostation, the interchain validator. Cosmostation is a non-custodial multi-chain cryptocurrency browser extension wallet that supports 50+ chains including Ethereum, Cosmos, dYdX Chain, Sui, and more. With Cosmostation, you can manage all your assets with one wallet, one key. Cosmostation has been a web3 infrastructure team contributing to more than 50 protocols since 2018. Our suite of products include Mintscan block explorer, Cosmostation non-custodial crypto wallet, and node validator service. At Cosmostation, we bootstrap networks and onboard end-users.
